\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 13008}

\subsection*{Wow}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Hollywood}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1 cig. & smoked & Calea zacatechichi & dried\\
\hline
 T+ 1:00 & 1 cig. & smoked & Calea zacatechichi & dried\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 175.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I sat down and finally smoked two cigarettes of calea mixed with a `Third-Eye' blend (for relaxation), and had some decent results.  I had very vivid and long dreams, and they were quite strange. 



Calea-approx. 1.5 grams

Third-Eye Blend-approx. 2-2.5 grams 



I smoked them with my wife, one about 1.5 hours before we went to bed, and the other about a half hour before.  I felt very relaxed before hand, and the images were quite abundant when I closed my eyes.



I definitely prefer smoking dream herb instead of drinking the tea, which is down right disgusting even when mixed with camomille, california poppy, and honey.

\end{document}
